author: Daniel Wiessner
title: Fight for $15 urges NLRB to suspend settlement talks with McDonald's
text:
Union-backed organizing group Fight for $15 on Monday asked the National Labor Relations Board’s general counsel to suspend settlement talks with McDonald’s Corp in a major case claiming the company is liable for labor law violations by franchisees.
In a letter to General Counsel Peter Robb, Fight for $15 counsel Mary Joyce Carlson said a long-running trial against McDonald’s should resume after the NLRB overturned a December decision that had made it more difficult to prove that companies are “joint employers” of contract or franchise workers.
